channel.title: Force Load map region (Delta - 317)
channel.description:
Is there a way to force update the map region? (Server side) Either by a command or by changing heights or something similar because i have a pesky bug with my current client, and need a way to resolve this.
I've recently spent several hours on this but cannot figure out away, i've called it by case but it doesn't seem to do anything.
-- Still need help on this --
-- still --
